int Msg::setParam ( int  index,
char  format,
  ... 
)

Sets a parameter @ index

Each time a parameter is set, the internal 'size' variable is incremented: thus, if this method is used on a parameter more than once, the 'size' count will be incorrect.

Parameters:
index parameter index
format parameter format [a|s|l|d]
Returns:
0 SUCCESS

1 FAILURE
